TopicTitle: Issue with Science archive where a biome name is contained with another biome's name

Articles.Content:
IDK if this is known, but was something I spotted whilst playing today.

If you go into the Research Facility, then go onto science archives, search for all science collected in Mun's "Farside Crater", I find that it displays not only science collected from the Farside Crater, but also science data collected in "East Farside Crater".

Presumably this is cause when the program searches the list of science data, it checks the biome's name and see's if the String value for the name of the biome selected by the user in the interface is contained within the String value for the name of the biome that the search is currently focused on. Because all "East Farside Crater" science data contains the String "Farside Crater", they are displayed alongside data from "Farside Crater" when selected in the interface.

Hope that makes sense.

Edit: Excuse the slight spelling mistake in the title, should be "within" not "with".
